narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Mrs. G's Services, LLC is a Home Health provider based in Port Chester, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $103.0M in Medicaid payments across 538K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $103.0M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 12,881 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
